description: This file defines a React functional component named Layout which composes the main application shell by including Sidebar, Topbar, and MobileNav components, arranging them in a grid layout with some styling. It serves as a layout wrapper for pages or sections of the application.

methods.name: Layout({ title = 'Welcome', children })
methods.description: A React functional component that renders the application's main layout with sidebar, topbar, content, and mobile navigation components.
